description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Casserole with Lemon & Mustard recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Chicken Casserole with Lemon & Mustard Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 chicken thigh cutlets with skin on

recipeInstructions.text: Simmer, partially covered for 2025 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Squeeze over the lemon to taste, scatter with parsley. Serve with steamed green beans and crusty bread.
